sentences.en: Colonel Brandon's delicate unobtrusive inquiries were never unwelcome to Miss Dashwood.
sentences.cn: 布兰登上校的亲切而不唐突的问询一直受到达什伍德小姐的欢迎.
狗能够阻拦不受欢迎的闯入者.

sentences.en: He parried the unwelcome question very skilfully.
sentences.cn: 他很巧妙地避开了那个不受欢迎的问题.

sentences.en: He sensed that his proposals were unwelcome.
sentences.cn: 他觉得他的建议不受欢迎.

sentences.en: He was pleased to be able to fling off such an unwelcome responsibility.
sentences.cn: 能摆脱如此令人厌烦的责任他感到很高兴.

sentences.en: His vulgarity made him unwelcome in our home.
sentences.cn: 他行为粗野,这使他在我们家不受欢迎.

sentences.en: I felt that we were unwelcome.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我们是不受欢迎的.

sentences.en: Nixon was less likely to brush off the bearer of unwelcome intelligence.
sentences.cn: 尼克松不大可能对他的逆耳之言置之不理.

sentences.en: She was, quite deliberately, making him feel unwelcome.
sentences.cn: 她是有意让他觉得自己不受欢迎。

sentences.en: The media has brought more unwelcome attention to the Royal Family.
sentences.cn: 媒体对王室的过度关注令人反感。

sentences.en: The move from London was entirely unwelcome to her.
sentences.cn: 迁出伦敦是他所极不情愿的.

sentences.en: The people in the room seemed to regard her as an unwelcome intruder.
sentences.cn: 屋子里的人似乎把她当成不受欢迎的外人。

sentences.en: Their hostile looks showed that he was unwelcome.
sentences.cn: 他们怀敌意的表情说明他不受欢迎.

sentences.en: They perceived that they were unwelcome and left.
sentences.cn: 他们意识到他们是不受欢迎的,于是就离开了.

sentences.en: To avoid attracting unwelcome attention he kept his voice down.
sentences.cn: 为避免引起不必要的注意，他把声音压低了。

trans.tran_cn: 不受欢迎的，令人失望的，令人讨厌的
trans.tran_en: unwelcome guests, visitors etc are people who you do not want in your home
